name: Anonymous
message:
you may have success if you add the repository via the synatptic package manager instead.
for Ubuntu v. precise pangolin:
Applications -> System Tools -> Administration -> Synaptic Package Manager
or can launch synaptic from the terminal bu issuing the command:
gksudo synaptic
once you have launched synaptic, please look in the settings menu and select repositories.
you should look at the tabs in this menu, and select a dependency-containing repository from the available options.
